sen.j: 琴引浜（ことひきはま）は、京都府京丹後市（旧網野町）にある砂浜。
sen.e: Kotohiki-hama Beach is a sand beach located in Kyo-tango City (former Amino-cho Town), Kyoto Prefecture.
Kotohiki-hama Beach is a sandy beach located in Kyo-tango City (former Amino-cho Town), Kyoto Prefecture.
Kotohiki-hama Beach is a sandy beach located in Kyotango City (former Amino-cho), Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 鳴き砂で有名な白砂青松の景勝地で、全長は1.8km。
sen.e: Its 1.8-km coast is famous for naki-suna (the sand making sounds when people walk on it) and is also a beaty sopt with white sand and green pines.
Its 1.8-km coast is famous for naki-suna (the sand making sounds when people walk on it) and is also a beautiful spot with white sand and green pines.
Its 1.8-km coast is famous for naki-suna (the sand making sounds when people walk on it) and is also a beautiful spot with white sand and green pines.

sen.j: 国指定の天然記念物・名勝（2007年指定）。
sen.e: This beach was designated as a national nature treasure and a beaty spot (in 2007).
This beach was designated as a national nature treasure and a beauty spot (in 2007).
This beach was designated as a national nature treasure and a beauty spot (in 2007).

sen.j: 地元では鳴り砂と呼ぶ人も多い。
sen.e: Locally, the beach is often called naki-suna (the sand making sounds when people walk on it)
Locally, the beach is often called naki-suna (the sand making sounds when people walk on it)
Locally, the beach is often called nari-suna (the sand making sounds when people walk on it)

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 北近畿タンゴ鉄道北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線
sen.e: The Miyazu Line of Kitakinki Tango Railway
The Miyazu Line of Kitakinki Tango Railway
The Miyazu Line of Kitakinki Tango Railway

sen.j: 網野駅より丹後海陸交通バス乗車、所要11〜14分。
sen.e: Ride from Amino Station a bus operated by Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co.,Ltd., and it takes 11 to 14 minutes to reach the beach.
Riding from Amino Station by a bus operated by Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co., Ltd., takes 11 to 14 minutes to reach the beach.
Riding from Amino Station by a bus operated by Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co., Ltd., takes eleven to fourteen minutes to reach the beach.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 峰山駅より丹後海陸交通バス乗車、所要30〜33分。
sen.e: Ride from Mineyama Station a bus by operated Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co.,Ltd., and it takes 30 to 33 minutes to reach the beach.
Riding from Mineyama Station by a bus operated by Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co.,Ltd., takes only 30 to 33 minutes to reach the beach.
Riding from Mineyama Station by a bus operated by Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co., Ltd., takes thirty to thirty-three minutes to reach the beach.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: いずれも、琴引浜（ことひきはま・2006年・掛津を改称。）下車。
sen.e: When you gets on either of the buses, get off the bus at the Kotohiki-hama Beach bus stop (changed from the Kakezu bus stop in 2006).
If using either of these buses, get off at the Kotohiki-hama Beach bus stop (changed from the Kakezu bus stop in 2006).
If using either of these buses, get off at the Kotohiki-hama Beach bus stop (changed from the Kakezu bus stop in 2006).

sen.j: 夕日ヶ浦海岸 - 日本の夕日百選
sen.e: Yuhigaura Beach: selected as one of the most beautiful setting sun-seeing spots in Japan.
Yuhigaura Beach: selected as one of the most beautiful sunset-watch spots in Japan.
Yuhigaura Beach: selected as one of the 100 most beautiful sunset-watch spots in Japan.
